org.sandag.popsyn
Class PopulationSynthesizer

java.lang.Object
  org.sandag.popsyn.PopulationSynthesizer

public class PopulationSynthesizer
extends java.lang.Object

The main class for generating a synthetic population. A synthetic population represents the decision-makers whose travel choices the ABM will simulate.

Field Summary
private  Balancer balancer
          Balances PUMS sample household/GQ weights to control targets by TAZ

synthesizePopulation

public int synthesizePopulation()
                         throws java.lang.Exception
Generates a synthetic population. This method involves classifying PUMS households, balancing household weights, and validating results against observed data.

Returns:
Returns an integer, 0, when the method has finished
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

getVersionMgrDao

public IVersionManagerDao getVersionMgrDao()
Gets the VersionManagerDAO. The VersionManagerDao is the data access object for the Version object.

Returns:
Returns the VersionManagerDAO object being used

setVersionMgrDao

public void setVersionMgrDao(IVersionManagerDao avMgrDao)
Sets the VersionManagerDao. The VersionManagerDao is the data access object for the Version object.

Parameters:
avMgrDao - the VersionManagerDao object to use

getBalancer

public Balancer getBalancer()
Gets the Balancer object. The Balancer balances PUMS sample household/GQ weights to control targets by TAZ. It also handles the discretizing of household and GQ weights, as well as the allocation of Household objects to the MGRA level.

Returns:
Returns the Balancer object

setBalancer

public void setBalancer(Balancer balancer)
Sets the Balancer object. The Balancer balances PUMS sample household/GQ weights to control targets by TAZ. It also handles the discretizing of household and GQ weights, as well as the allocation of Household objects to the MGRA level.

Parameters:
balancer - the Balancer object to use

getVersion

public Version getVersion()
Gets the Version object associated with this PopSyn run. The Version object records parameter/version information for each run.

Returns:
Returns the Version object being used

setVersion

public void setVersion(Version version)
Sets the Version object associated with this PopSyn run. The Version object records parameter/version information for each run.

Parameters:
version - the Version object to use

getControlDefinitions

public java.util.List<IControlDefinition<Household>> getControlDefinitions()
Gets the control definitions. Control categories are specific demographic/socioeconomic variables that PopSyn will try to match at the zonal level. Each control category is defined in control-target-config.xml.

Returns:
Returns the control definitions

setControlDefinitions

public void setControlDefinitions(java.util.List<IControlDefinition<Household>> controlDefinitions)
Sets the control definitions to use. Control categories are specific demographic/socioeconomic variables that PopSyn will try to match at the zonal level. Each control category is defined in control-target-config.xml.

getValidatorDao

public ValidatorDao getValidatorDao()
Gets the ValidatorDao object. The ValidatorDao is the data access object for the Validator.

Returns:
Returns the ValidatorDAO object

setValidatorDao

Sets the ValidatorDao object. The ValidatorDao is the data access object for the Validator.

Parameters:
validatorDao - the ValidatorDao object to use

getClassifier

public Classifier getClassifier()
Gets the Classifier object. The Classifier classifies PUMS households/GQ by control category by PUMA. Households and GQ are classified separately.

Returns:
Returns the Classifier object

setClassifier

public void setClassifier(Classifier classifier)
Sets the Classifier object. The Classifier classifies PUMS households/GQ by control category by PUMA. Households and GQ are classified separately.

Parameters:
classifier - the Classifier object to use
